New Yorkers are bracing for an immigration crackdown, while the city faces challenges including a tragic deliveryman accident, ongoing gas outages for Bronx residents, and a controversial housing market overhaul. Additionally, NYC's life expectancy has reached a record high amid various public safety and infrastructure concerns.

### Risks & Alerts

- New Yorkers prepare for potential immigration crackdown, raising concerns among local communities. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxPQWFQRHhHMG1uOVlKT3JxRnk2clFOYWZlNk5VYjVOR0xjOVEwWTkxWUFLc091bFR2RVo0VWp0b2pZSkhwWThzaDBDcG8tUFlkNTh3R015d1c5eWpDaUVHeENnYTFlX05nS3lhcVdlOG5tX2Fla2p0d19UVlNGckEwSnBEY3lHYUQ1aWdrWDY0TVRnTUw3SDVqX2NDUnJENkZnZmc?oc=5)
- Brooklyn pizza deliveryman critically injured after collision with a Lexus. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMigwFBVV95cUxQU05sNE5SUnhRODV6MG51YUtKZXZDZHZmRm1ZRlJ3VXdOMzdxQVZXb3RueWQ3ZzBub1NYdC1FU1loWWxpdlNkcEdGdGxHY2pGT2Izc2dnOTBRX1BPQ2FVQXhxcnZqdEF3VEFiMFpWR3dEbWc2S2FCZUtHS3RZcERJZ1BXOA?oc=5)

[↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimAFBVV95cUxNeG9yWEloVjJRWXZiNVhQWldxNE1MNkZWbnJtLVh3M01kNE90LU1kQ2NRZTJxSzgzNmwtcVlZTjlGbXhOaGpRVjV1WEY2bnRkTnc1dkVidW1reU4zbXFpQUt1c0NMVC13cC1rdHhlOWFpT2RIYlRCSUxDeXJ4XzR3RmpSX1loa0JoQXQ4VlpfRlF2ZTFkQjhLeQ?oc=5)
- Expect 30-minute delays at New Jersey tunnels affecting traffic into New York. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- NYC Council plans to vote on pay raises for its members and the mayor by the end of the year. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuAFBVV95cUxOemR6YTRSQVJiNHZKU2RnS1VVZ3QxMXltV09aOHh1ZzFpcnVscmFhNHp3OTRTeVRSZWh6UGk5Y01DWmdyNllWMWJjQnBGZXliQmthYmV1aDRKN0NwYXB0ZWdwZmYtVFhtUXlJWXA4Vm52WXY3Q2UxWWllQU5hQ2N6b3YzM0cyR1hnLUxuTHpOcDV1NXpuMjY2RlMzUHh6M04tYW85b05KS1FreW9XcXdmdHBrSjlLR19a?oc=5)
- City Council plans to wreck NYC’s housing market in the name of affordability, according to critics. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisAFBVV95cUxPUDY2WV9MS0NISl9pN0NudVk0R0d3OFgxWE1reUhTTTE4SmxiUXl4c2hCZV84ZGpFbGdBaWpvSUNsdUt6dTNwLXJ5dHVCUmVIaTZwRDZkYWhiS29JME5NdUd4Ym9kTGJaZkFjUWdXaEFxZlZZV3A3a3NSTmlhN2pGdERRLTBaenJGOEJoNUdUUmN0dGc4VlZnb21YVkU4QlZlUnlnOGROLXJzQlJBU0VHVQ?oc=5)
- Bronx NYCHA residents still without gas after the October building collapse. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Mayor Eric Adams’ administration opposes a proposed Airbnb bill, citing serious concerns. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMixAFBVV95cUxNQlFRLTVYUmFTYTUxcWlKc050QXZ1c2RMRldVeHlMLTExRVI2aF9HT0kwWU40clN1N25qS29YUDV6enRiRG81N2VibDdTQ2NUdjZDYWpKSFBJaGFtQ1JKaWNWZHRGdXdpUE9sTTRFcU5WbjNUSlFCelNsal9WUW5nNmpBYks4QVF2cmJQa1BOUUYxWVl3U0pBSXhOWmowMjZjWjJ0VmxzNllNd2hSeWoxdWlUSnNSS1FQczVCSTRoSWZuLV8z?oc=5)
- NYC long claimed it had no information on the 9/11 toxins at Ground Zero; now they have 68 boxes worth. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Opportunities & Welfare

- NYC life expectancy reaches 83.2 years, highest in history, following the 'Healthy NYC Plan'. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Housing Lottery opens for 1054 41st Street in Borough Park, Brooklyn. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxNTWh2X3p3SzNweXExSDJWRFo4V3JjNTZpNE5CX3RYdXNyU051Z1h2RnlnbTR0WExRTmhEb1R0bUpDdDRObUROR1pvZWZJM0RaVW1MS0c3VDNOTXFsTUN3b2NIdlpqbDNWeVp2c0pMa0YyOWtvVDNTS0NhN1luS2lJY2ZVV2NCbkM2YUZnVEZaUV9XSVdXRC1hQ3hFQVBvSURIdEJickY0ajhub0lf?oc=5)
